trans-unit.source: Implements the `LC` task.
trans-unit.target: 实现`LC`任务。

trans-unit.source: Use the `LC` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 使用`LC`项目文件以创建和执行此任务中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [LC Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关用法和参数信息，请参阅[LC 任务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.LC"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.LC"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Generates command line arguments that the license compiler tool (lc.exe) must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
trans-unit.target: 生成直接从命令行而不是从响应文件，许可证编译器工具 (lc.exe) 必须运行的命令行参数。

trans-unit.source: Command line builder to add arguments to.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加到参数的命令行生成器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full file path of the license compiler tool (lc.exe).
trans-unit.target: 返回许可证编译器工具 (lc.exe) 的完整文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The full file path of the license compiler tool, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the license compiler tool file is not found.
trans-unit.target: 许可证编译器工具的完整文件路径或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到许可证编译器工具文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the executable for which the .licenses files are generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为其生成.licenses 文件的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: The executable for which the .licenses files are generated.
trans-unit.target: 为其生成.licenses 文件的可执行文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to suppress the Microsoft startup banner display.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否禁止显示 Microsoft 启动版权标志。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Microsoft startup banner display is suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果显示 Microsoft 启动版权标志将被禁止显示;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the directory in which to place the output .licenses files.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用来放置输出.licenses 文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory in which to place the output .licenses files.
trans-unit.target: 用来放置输出.licenses 文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置.licenses 文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a name, the name of the .licx file is used and the .licenses file is placed in the directory that contains the .licx file.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定一个名称，使用.licx 文件的名称和.licenses 文件放置在包含.licx 文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The name of the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: .Licenses 文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the referenced components to load when generating the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在生成.licenses 文件时加载的引用的组件。

trans-unit.source: The referenced components to load when generating the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 要在生成.licenses 文件时加载的引用的组件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to use to search for the SDK tools.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要用于搜索 SDK 工具的路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the SDK tools path.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 SDK 工具的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the items that contain licensed components to include in the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含授权的组件要包含在.licenses 文件的项。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the documentation for the `/complist` switch in [Lc.exe (License Compiler)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档`/complist`切入[Lc.exe （许可证编译器）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The items that contain licensed components to include in the .licenses file.
trans-unit.target: 包含授权的组件要包含在.licenses 文件中的项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the license compiler tool.
trans-unit.target: 获取许可证编译器工具的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the license compiler tool.
trans-unit.target: 许可证编译器工具的名称。

trans-unit.source: Validates input parameters and logs errors or warnings, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有，验证输入的参数和日志错误或警告。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether task execution should proceed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否应继续执行任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution should proceed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应继续执行任务;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
